activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11751
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan can you please assign me this issue 

Describe your solution clearly
To handle expired appointments efficiently, I will implement an automatic cancellation system. When a user opens the appointment dialog, the system will check if the current date and time have passed the scheduled appointment time. If the appointment is still active and not in a final state (like “Completed” or “Cancelled”), it should be cancelled automatically

approach :- 
I will use a useEffect hook to trigger a function that compares the current time with the appointment’s start_date_time.
if the current time is greater, the system will call the cancel Appointment 
Expected Timeline
End date: within 24 hours after I've been assigned
